name: Handsome Roadkill
description:
REMEMBER THIS IS AN EARLY ALPHA AND CURRENT MENU SCREENS ARE NOT FINAL!!!

Handsome Roadkill is a Co-Op 2D horde shooter, designed in Click team Fusion 2.5. The main goal is to eliminate as many enemies as possible to fill the meter at the top of the screen, using guns, melees and equipment to help you out. 

Features!

Class customization!

Difficulties! (Easy, Normal, Expert, Nightmare, Roadkill... Each is individually unlocked per map after you beat it.)

Player Individual leveling system!

4 player coop + Bots!

Special enemy types!

15+ guns (Tons more coming soon)

Perk selection! (Perks to help improve your character!)

CONTROLS

HOLD "ESC" TO PAUSE GAME AND EXIT

"WASD" to move

"SPACEBAR" to jump

"R" to Reload

"E" to Pickup Gun

"Q" to switch guns

Mouse to move gun + Left click to Shoot!

Customizable controls? (Depends on if people demand it enough.)

Guns in V0.0.1a build are alpha and I'm already aware they are buggy. These include (Spas-12, Knife, BAR. ONLY P1 can pick them up!!!)

Please report any bugs or issues you may have found with the game! This can help keep a stable build in the future releases! Main goal is to get this project on steam! So please consider supporting to help out!
